name: KASABA
description:
Explore a small open world!

Where every pixel is hand drawn.

A town where everyone is miserable and you are no different.

Nuclear waste runs through the blood of every resident in this island

Meet wacky characters , hang out with your friends , take pictures .

Come visit "KASABA"

"WASD" to move

"C" to open camera

"E" to interact

"G" to pick up objects

"P" to open your phone(main menu)

"Spacebar" to jump

Game by: Taylan Kahraman

Original Soundtrack by: Cem Yiğit Yılmaz
